Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/Lupus Erythematosus, Cutaneous/Lupus Erythematosus, Discoid/Panniculitis, Lupus Erythematosus
Record.Description: A type of lupus erythematosus characterized by deep dermal or subcutaneous nodules, most often on the head, face, or upper arms. It is generally chronic and occurs most often in women between the ages of 20 and 45.
